entry.title: Recovery Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 13.00

Recovery Salve is great for when your body aches after a tough climbing session or long work day! Perfect for athletes to help soothe tension and pains.

Infused with anti-inflammatories, Arnica flowers and Menthol (found naturally in peppermint) for relief from inflammations, bruises and tension in the body. 


Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

How to use

Massage salve onto sore areas as needed. Should feel a slight cooling, refreshing sensation, but not overpowering.

CAUTION: Please wash hands before touching face as menthol will irritate eyes! If needed, rise out with soap and water. For external use only!

Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Ingredients

Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Menthol, Candelilla wax, Arnica, Magnesium, and Essential oils of Camphor, Clove, Rosemary, and Lavender.

entry.title: Vegan Skin Salve
entry.summary:
Vendor: Onsight Care
Type: Vegan Skin Salve
Price: 12.00

Use Onsight Vegan Skin Salve to keep skin in its best condition after a tough day of rock climbing, work or everyday life. Our salve is for everyone who is rough on their hands and needs some soothing repair after a long day. Great for dry skin, cuts and scrapes.

Vegan Skin Salve is formulated to absorb quick so it's less greasy than traditional salves. Not much is needed for it to work, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way so our salve lasts you longer!

Features + Benefits

  • Natural
  • Vegan
  • Plastic Free

Ingredients

entry.title: Chocolate Mandarin Hand, Body and Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Skin Essence Organics
Type: Skin Treatment
Price: 18.00

This rich balm is ideal for moisturizing and soothing dry, rough skin. Within a few seconds of application the skin appears and feels noticeably softer and smoother. Chocolate Mandarin is an excellent option for those who have dehydrated skin, as the key ingredients offer a rich, long lasting hydration that help to naturally improve the skin’s overall elasticity, texture and moisture.

Features + Benefits

  • Hydrates and soothes dry, chapped, and sensitive skin
  • Offers rich, long lasting hydration for dry hands, heels, and lips
  • Naturally concentrated formula helps maintain softer, smoother skin
  • Subtle cocoa butter and orange natural aroma.
  • Leaping Bunny Certified, Non GMO, Gluten Free and Fair Trade

Composition

This fresh organic formulation effectively softens and nourishes, while the vast amount of cocoa butter keeps the skin flexible, sealing in moisture.

Ingredients

Jojoba Seed Oil*, Cocoa Butter*, Beeswax, Rosehip Seed Oil*, Coconut Oil*, Castor Oil*, Orange Oil*, Tocopherol (Vitamin-E) *Ingredient from organic farming

entry.title: Good Fats Body Butter (2oz)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Body Butter
Price: 14.00

A unique blend of plant-based oils which leaves skin baby soft and without greasy residue.  Say goodbye to plastics, petrol chemicals and harsh fragrances. Stay ultra-hydrated with this all-natural and oh-so-creamy butter that absorbs into the skin within 90 seconds. 

Features + Benefits

  • A Natural Humectant – meaning it helps your skin draw in moisture to stay hydrated.
  • Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Chemical-free.
  • Choose Your Plant-Based Scent – or go Unscented.
  • Comes in 2oz recyclable and returnable aluminum tin.

Ingredients

Organic Avocado Butter, Organic Olive Butter, Organic Avocado Oil, Essential Oils
